  • Constructor Details

    • Token

      public Token()
      Is the constructor of the Token. Tries to read the value saved in the file, if there is not any value in the file it is set to -1

    • Token

      public Token(int token)
      The constructor of the Object Token that sets a specific value of the token attributes on creation
      Parameters:
      token - is the value to be set as the token

  • Method Details

    • getTokenLine

      public String getTokenLine() throws NoTokenException
      This method reads all the lines in the file and return the string corresponding to the token red
      Returns:
      the line corresponding to the token
      Throws:
      NoTokenException - if the file does not exist

    • doesTokenExists

      public boolean doesTokenExists()
      A method that checks if the file exists
      Returns:
      true if the file exists, false otherwise

    • doesCodexFolderExists

      public boolean doesCodexFolderExists()
      A method that checks if the folder, where the token value should be stored, exist
      Returns:
      true if the folder exists, false otherwise

    • rewriteTokenFile

      public boolean rewriteTokenFile()
      This method overwrite the value of the token found in the file. If the folder does not exist it is created. If the file already exists it is eliminated and then created. Lastly the value of the token is wrote
      Returns:
      the boolean value corresponding to the existence of the folder

    • getTempToken

      public int getTempToken()
      A method that returns the value of the tempToken
      Returns:
      the value of the tempToken

    • setTempToken

      public void setTempToken(int tempToken)
      A method that set the value of the tempToken to a value obtained as a parameter
      Parameters:
      tempToken - is the value to be set as the new tempToken

    • getToken

      public int getToken()
      A method that returns the value of the token
      Returns:
      the value of the token

    • setToken

      public void setToken(int token)
      A method that set the value of the tempToken to a value obtained as a parameter
      Parameters:
      token - is the value to be set as the new tempToken
